name: Struckd - 3D Game Creator
detailed_description:
Struckd is the place for people of all ages to come together and create, share & play games.

Build your own game and play thousands of others from the worldwide community.

Struckd is the next generation gaming platform for mobile and desktop.

Create, Share & Play Games:

Have you ever dreamed to build your own game in an easy and intuitive way?
To setup your rules and characters without coding but in a living and exciting 3D world with your friends and family?
Choose one of the many game packs to build your first own game step by step. Choose the most popular genres like racing, action, adventure and more!
Or do you want to build a game out of your immagination?
Combine any game elements from all different styles to setup your own rules. It's your universe!
Once you win your game you can share it: Challange your friends with your tricky levels or play games from the community. All creations are user generated and ready to be explored!
Experiment, excite and gamify in this interactive, virtual world!

Features:

- No coding skills required!
- Game Builder with 3D drag and drop. It was never easier to setup games!
- Play section: Play thousands of user created games to like and comment!
- Community driven: Climb up in the leaderboard, get your highscore and challenge your friends!
- Social creativity: Build together with your family and engage through creativity!
- Game elements: Ready to use game elements spice your creations!
- Game packs: Sets of game elements guide you through differend gameplay templates!
- Beginner friendly: Blueprints and introductions help you to start from scratch!
- Free to play cross-platform experience

Have fun!

If you like those keywords, you will like Struckd :)
